panel.label: Main
panel.name: General

check_box.label: Where applicable, save Vanity settings per-account.
check_box.tool_tip: Saves settings per-account, allowing easier customization for alts.
check_box.name: use_account_settings_check

check_box.label: Hide the Teleport progress screens
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, the viewer will hide the teleport progress screen, allowing you to continue to read IMs.
check_box.name: disable_tp_screen_check

check_box.label: Play the Teleport sound when teleporting between regions
check_box.tool_tip: Viewer will play the wooshing TP noise on teleport.
check_box.name: tp_sound_check

check_box.label: Hide the Login/Logout progress screens
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, the viewer will hide the login/logout progress screen.
check_box.name: disable_logout_screen_check

check_box.label: Disable chat, whisper and shout animations
check_box.tool_tip: Remove chat animations from your own avatar. Effect visible to everyone
check_box.name: disable_chat_animation

check_box.label: Add attachments and wearables instead of replacing them
check_box.tool_tip: When double clicking or pressing enter in inventory with wearables or objects selected they will be added to your outfit, instead of replacing the wearable or object currently at their target destination.
check_box.name: add_not_replace

check_box.label: Animate when going into Appearance Mode
check_box.name: customize_anim

check_box.label: Turn around when walking backwards
check_box.tool_tip: Certain AOs may turn you around even with this disabled.
check_box.name: turn_around

check_box.label: Announce when someone takes a snapshot
check_box.tool_tip: Won't announce for people who hide the fact that they are taking a snapshot.
check_box.name: announce_snapshots

check_box.label: Announce music stream's metadata in local chat when tuned in
check_box.tool_tip: When a new song comes on, a message will be displayed in local chat with available information about the track.
check_box.name: announce_stream_metadata

check_box.label: Let scripts steal focus when they can't compile due to errors
check_box.name: script_errors_steal_focus

check_box.label: Connect to neighboring regions
check_box.name: connect_to_neighbors

check_box.label: Auto-minimize region restart notice
check_box.name: region_restart_minimized
check_box.tool_tip: Useful for sim owners and people who need to pack up before leaving

panel.text: Sound played when regions will restart:

line_editor.name: UISndRestart
line_editor.tool_tip: Empty for no sound to play

spinner.label: Inactive Transparency
spinner.tool_tip: When a floater loses focus, this controls how much its opacity changes.
spinner.name: Inactive Transparency

spinner.label: Active Transparency
spinner.tool_tip: When a floater is in focus, this controls how much its opacity changes.
spinner.name: Active Transparency

check_box.label: Broadcast Client Tag:
check_box.tool_tip: Choose whether others see that you enjoy [SHORT_APP_NAME].
check_box.name: show_my_tag_check

combo_box.tool_tip: The client tag (And subsequent color) to broadcast. Overridden locally by Custom Tag/Color.
combo_box.name: tag_spoofing_combobox

check_box.label: Display client tag to self
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will show your client tag on your avatar name locally.
check_box.name: show_self_tag_check

check_box.label: Display client tag color to self
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this set your avatar name color to your client tag color or custom set color.
check_box.name: show_self_tag_color_check

check_box.label: Display friend client tags as (Friend)
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this changes your friends' client tags to (Friend).
check_box.name: show_friend_tag_check

check_box.label: Display client tag on a new line
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will show client tag on a new line.
check_box.name: display_client_new_line_check

check_box.label: Use a custom color and label (Local only)
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will let you set your own name tag to show up with your custom client and tag color. This only shows up to yourself.
check_box.name: customize_own_tag_check

line_editor.name: custom_tag_label_box
line_editor.tool_tip: The custom string you would like to replace your client tag with (Local only)

color_swatch.name: custom_tag_color_swatch
color_swatch.tool_tip: The custom color you would like to replace your client color with (Local only)

check_box.label: Display client tag for others
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will show client tag names on others' avatar names.
check_box.name: show_other_tag_check

check_box.label: Display client tag color for others
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this sets others' avatar name color to their client's color.
check_box.name: show_client_tag_color_check

check_box.label: Show Idle Time
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will show the amount of time an avatar has been idle.
check_box.name: show_idle_time_check

check_box.label: Automatically check website for updates to client definitions
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will allow [SHORT_APP_NAME] to download fresh definitions when needed.
check_box.name: update_tags_check

check_box.label: Use user status colors (Friend, Linden, etcetera below)
check_box.tool_tip: Enabling this will show people who match specific criteria (Lindens, Estate owners, friends, muted people) with the color you've set below.
check_box.name: use_status_check

color_swatch.label: Others
color_swatch.name: others_color_swatch
color_swatch.tool_tip: Color of everyone else on the minimap and world map

color_swatch.label: Custom (Minimap)
color_swatch.name: custom_color_swatch
color_swatch.tool_tip: Color of users picked out on the minimap only

check_box.tool_tip: Color Estate Managers Chat

check_box.name: color_linden_check

check_box.name: color_muted_check
check_box.tool_tip: Color Muted Chat
